scripts.build: (pnpm run build --filter @manuscripts/manuscript-transform 2>/dev/null || true) && (pnpm run build --filter @manuscripts/style-guide 2>/dev/null || true) && (pnpm run build --filter @manuscripts/manuscript-editor 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.ex:api: concurrently --kill-others 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-api' 'pnpm run dev --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-api' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-collab' 'pnpm run dev --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-collab'
scripts.ex:utils: concurrently --kill-others 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-shared' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-schema' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/examples-track-editor' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/ext-track-changes' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/ext-yjs'
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/quarterback-shared' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/track-changes-plugin' 'pnpm run watch --filter @manuscripts/quarterback-api' 'pnpm run dev --filter @manuscripts/quarterback-api'
